steps.name: I start the "Find your application" app
I should be on the "Link sent" page of the "Find your application" app
the page title should contain "Check your email"
the page content should contain "We have sent a link for you to change your flight details to"
I start the "Find your application" app
I should be on the "EVW not verified" page of the "Find your application" app
I start the "Find your application" app
I should be on the "EVW expired" page of the "Find your application" app
I start the "Find your application" app
I should be on the "Update limit reached" page of the "Find your application" app
I start the "Find your application" app

arguments.content: We can't find your electronic visa waiver number

elements.name: Page not found start link should go to find your application

steps.name: I start the "Page not found" app
the page title should contain "The page or item you were looking for has not been found"
the page title should contain "Enter your details"
I start the Update journey details app with an invalid token
the page body should contain "The page or item you were looking for has not been found"

elements.name: Entering new flight details and correct flight found

steps.name: I start the Update journey details app
the page title should contain "Your new journey to the UK"
I should be on the "Flight number" page of the "Update journey details" app
the page title should contain "Your new flight details"
I should be on the "Arrival date" page of the "Update journey details" app
the page title should contain "Your new flight details"
I enter a date "2 months" in the future into "Arrival date"
I should be on the "Is this your flight" page of the "Update journey details" app
the page title should contain "Is this your flight to the UK?"
the "Arrival date" should contain a date "2 months" in the future
I should be on the "Departure date and time" page of the "Update journey details" app
the page title should contain "Your journey to the UK"
I enter a date "2 months" in the future into "Departure date"
I enter the time "07:15" into "Departure time"
the page title should contain "Check your answers"

arguments.content:
Departure country
                  United Arab Emirates
Departure airport
                  Dubai
Departure date
                  ${"2 months" in the "future"}
Departure time
                  7:15
Flight number
                  KU101
Arrival airport
                  London - Gatwick
Arrival date
                  ${"2 months" in the "future"}
Arrival time
                  18:45

steps.name: I should be on the "Declaration" page of the "Update journey details" app

arguments.content:
The new flight information I have entered is correct to the best of my knowledge and belief and is for my flight that lands in the UK.
On changing my flight details my old electronic visa waiver document will be invalid and I will not use it to try to enter the UK; if I do so I may be denied boarding or be refused entry at the UK border.
If I have completed this for someone else I have their full agreement.

steps.name: I should be on the "Confirmation" page of the "Update journey details" app
the "header notice complete" should contain "Request received"
the reference number should be present
I start the Update journey details app
I enter a date "2 months" in the future into "Arrival date"
the page title should contain "Your journey to the UK"
the page title should contain "Is this your flight to the UK?"
I enter a date "2 months" in the future into "Departure date"
I enter the time "07:15" into "Departure time"
the page title should contain "Check your answers"

arguments.content:
Departure country
                  Oman
Departure airport
                  Muscat - Seeb
Departure date
                  ${"2 months" in the "future"}

steps.name: I should be on the "Declaration" page of the "Update journey details" app
the reference number should be present

elements.name: Entering new flight details and flight not found

steps.name: I start the Update journey details app
the page title should contain "Your new journey to the UK"
I should be on the "Flight number" page of the "Update journey details" app
the page title should contain "Your new flight details"
I should be on the "Arrival date" page of the "Update journey details" app
the page title should contain "Your new flight details"
I enter a date "2 months" in the future into "Arrival date"
I should be on the "Flight not found" page of the "Update journey details" app
the page title should contain "We can’t find your flight"

arguments.content:
reference number (EVW123)
new flight number (if your journey has any stops or connecting flights we only need details of the flight landing in the UK)
airport this flight takes off from
new date this flight takes off
new time this flight takes off
UK arrival airport
new date of arrival in the UK
new time of arrival in the UK

steps.name: I should be on the "Flight number" page of the "Update journey details" app

elements.name: Entering new flight details and incorrect flight found

steps.name: I start the Update journey details app
the page title should contain "Your new journey to the UK"
I should be on the "Flight number" page of the "Update journey details" app
the page title should contain "Your new flight details"
I should be on the "Arrival date" page of the "Update journey details" app
the page title should contain "Your new flight details"
I enter a date "2 months" in the future into "Arrival date"
I should be on the "Is this your flight" page of the "Update journey details" app
the page title should contain "Is this your flight to the UK?"
I should be on the "Flight not found" page of the "Update journey details" app
the page title should contain "We can’t find your flight"
I should be on the "Flight number" page of the "Update journey details" app
I start the Update journey details app
I should be on the "Email us" page of the "Update journey details" app

arguments.content:
reference number: EVW123 (this is in the email we sent you)
new train number, eg Eurostar 9140
new train station you depart for the UK from
new date of departure for the UK
new time of departure for the UK
new UK arrival train station
new date of arrival in the UK
new time of arrival in the UK

steps.name: I start the Update journey details app
I should be on the "Email us" page of the "Update journey details" app

arguments.content:
reference number: EVW123 (this is in the email we sent you)
tail number of the plane you’ll be taking
airport this flight takes off from
new date your flight takes off
new time your flight takes off
new date of arrival in the UK
new time of arrival in the UK
UK arrival airport

steps.name: I start the Update journey details app
I should be on the "Email us" page of the "Update journey details" app

arguments.content:
reference number: EVW123 (this is in the email we sent you)
new boat name, eg ‘Spirit of Britain’
new port of departure for the UK, eg Calais
new date of departure for the UK
new time of departure for the UK
new port of arrival in the UK, eg Dover
new date of arrival in the UK
new time of arrival in the UK

steps.name: I start the Update journey details app
I should be on the "Email us" page of the "Update journey details" app

arguments.content:
date of arrival in Northern Ireland
expected time of arrival at your destination in Northern Ireland
method of road travel to Northern Ireland, eg bus or private car
arrival point in Northern Ireland, for example, the town or bus station where your bus or car drops you off

elements.name: Wrong details in Enter Your Details

steps.name: I start on the "Enter Your Details" page of the "Find your application" app

arguments.content:
Please use the correct date format, for example, 22 3 1979
Enter your electronic visa waiver number

elements.name: Entering an EVW number that is not found

steps.name: I start the "Find your application" app

arguments.content: We can't find your electronic visa waiver number

elements.name: Entering a dob that is non-numeric

steps.name: I start the "Find your application" app

arguments.content: Please use the correct date format, for example, 22 3 1979

elements.name: Entering an EVW number that cannot be updated

steps.name: I start the "Find your application" app
I should be on the "EVW expired" page of the "Find your application" app
the page title should contain "Electronic visa waiver expired"

elements.name: Not entering any details on the departure date and time page

steps.name: I start the Update journey details app
I enter a date "2 months" in the future into "Arrival date"

arguments.content:
Enter the date you will depart for the UK
Enter a valid time using the 24 hour clock, for example 09:45 or 21:45

steps.name: I enter the date "99-08-2016" into "Departure date"
I enter the time "35:00" into "Departure time"

arguments.content:
Enter a valid date
Enter a valid time using the 24 hour clock, for example 09:45 or 21:45
